channel.title: Software Development Portfolio on James Lawton
channel.description: Recent content in Software Development Portfolio on James Lawton

item.title: Raindrop Air Resistance Simulation
item.description: A simple python simulation Simulates a falling raindrop with air resistance and mass Used to write a paper analyzing how air resistance affects terminal velocity and distance traveled

item.title: Dijkstra’s Path-finding Algorithm Simulation
item.description: A simple python simulation Utilizes Dijkstra’s Path-finding Algorithm Finds the shortest paths to each point from a starting point on a directed graph.

item.title: Geographic Information System
item.description: Tool to parse through Geographic Data Uses a custom built PR Quad-Tree and Hash Table to store locations and names. Can easily query by location range and name range.

item.title: Hash Table
item.description: Data structure made to be versatile with a variable bucket size. Less space efficiency but more speed when querying

item.title: PR Quad Tree
item.description: Data structure similar to a binary tree. Each node contains four, a Northwest, Northeast, Southwest, and Southeast Effecient when storing and querying data that can be identified by a location coordinate.
